description: The results from the test evaluation of property measurement of the testable object property of the testable object per the test specifications shall be presented as test results. A test result reports the measured results and evaluation of test specification criteria from a test for a specific person, piece of equipment, physical asset, material lot or material sublot
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 2: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: isMadeUpOfResults
contents.description: The child test result(s) of this test result

contents.name: isMadeUpOfMeasurements
contents.description: The measurement obtained for each testable object property

contents.name: generatedInContextOf
contents.description: The operations test requirement object applied to execute the test and generate the test result

contents.name: recordsTestResultsFor
contents.description: The tested object recorded by this test result

contents.name: description
contents.description: Additional information about the test result

contents.name: hierarchyScope
contents.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy.

contents.name: hierarchyScopeRel
contents.comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.

contents.name: evaluationDate
contents.description: Date and time of evaluation of the test result

contents.name: evaluatedCriterionResult
contents.description: Result obtained from evaluation of the associated test specification criteria.

contents.name: otherEvaluatedCriterionResult
contents.description: Not part of the Standard. But makes 'evaluatedCriterionResult' property value list extensible

contents.name: expiration
contents.description: Date of the expiration of the test result criteria
